00205     EGS_ObjectFactory(const string &dsoPath, int where=0);

00215     virtual ~EGS_ObjectFactory();
00216 
00223     virtual void addKnownObject(EGS_Object *o) {
00224         if( o ) {
00225             o->ref(); known_objects.push_back(o);
00226         }
00227     };
00228 
00251     virtual EGS_Object *createSingleObject(EGS_Input *inp,

00253

00283             const char *funcname = 0, bool unique = true);
00284

00318 
00326     virtual bool addObject(EGS_Object *o, bool unique = true);
00327 
00331     void addKnownTypeId(const char *typeid_name);
00332 
00334     int  nObjects() const { return objects.size(); };
00335 
00337     EGS_Object* getObject(int j) { return (j>=0 && j<objects.size()) ? objects[j] : 0; };
00338

00340

00348 
00359 template <class T>
00360 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_TypedObjectFactory : public EGS_ObjectFactory {
00361 
00362 public:
00363 
00364     EGS_TypedObjectFactory(const string &dsoPath, const string &type,
00365             int where=0) :
00366         EGS_ObjectFactory(dsoPath,where), otype(type) {};
00367     ~EGS_TypedObjectFactory() {};
00368 
00369     bool isKnownTypeId(EGS_Object *o) const {
00370         for(int j=0; j<known_typeids.size(); j++) {
00371             if( known_typeids[j] == typeid(*o).name() ) return true;
00372         }
00373         return false;
00374     };
00375 
00376     bool isMyObjectType(EGS_Object *o, const char *func) {
00377         if( !o ) return false;
00378         T *t = dynamic_cast<T *>(o);
00379         bool res;
00380         if( t ) res = true;
00381         else res = isKnownTypeId(o);
00382         if( !res && func ) egsWarning("EGS_TypedObjectFactory::%s:\n"
00383              "  dynamic_cast to %s fails for object of type %s\n"
00384              "  This object's typeid is also not in the list of know typeids\n",
00385              func,otype.c_str(),o->getObjectType().c_str());
00386         return res;
00387     };
00388 
00389     void addKnownObject(EGS_Object *o) {
00390         if( isMyObjectType(o,"addKnownObject()") )
00391             EGS_ObjectFactory::addKnownObject(o);
00392         EGS_ObjectFactory::addKnownObject(o);
00393     };
00394 
00395     EGS_Object *createSingleObject(EGS_Input *i,
00396                         const char *fname = 0, bool u = true) {
00397         EGS_Object *o = EGS_ObjectFactory::createSingleObject(i,fname,u);
00398         if( o ) {
00399             if( !isMyObjectType(o,"createSingleObject()") ) {
00400                 delete o; o = 0;
00401             }
00402         }
00403         return o;
00404     };
00405 
00406     bool addObject(EGS_Object *o, bool unique = true) {
00407         if( !isMyObjectType(o,"addObject()") ) return false;
00408         return EGS_ObjectFactory::addObject(o,unique);
00409     };
00410 
00411 private:
00412 
00413     string   otype;
00414 
00415 };
00416
